[00:00.00]Wait - Maroon 5 (魔力红)/A Boogie Wit Da Hoodie

[00:05.58]Producer：John Ryan
[00:08.37]Dirty looks from your mother
[00:09.71]
[00:12.13]Never seen you in a dress that color no
[00:15.28]
[00:15.80]It's a special occasion
[00:17.59]
[00:19.56]Not invited but I'm glad I made it oh
[00:23.07]Let me apologize
[00:25.83]
[00:26.63]I'll make up make up make up make up for all those times
[00:29.64]
[00:30.74]Your love I don't wanna lose
[00:33.39]
[00:34.33]I'm beggin' beggin' beggin' beggin' I'm beggin' you
[00:37.22]
[00:38.35]Wait can you turn around can you turn around
[00:41.75]Just wait can we work this out can we work this out
[00:45.53]Just wait can you come here please 'cause I wanna be with you
[00:51.77]

[00:56.97]Just wait can we work this out can we work this out
[01:00.78]Just wait could you come here please 'cause I wanna be with you
[01:05.34]

[01:10.79]

[01:16.16]

[01:18.34]

[01:24.08]Let me apologize yeah
[01:27.49]I'll make up make up make up make up for all those times all those times
[01:31.81]Your love I don't wanna lose
[01:34.38]

[02:01.58]Just wait could you come here please 'cause I wanna be with you
[02:06.21]

[02:14.14]Don't let me down can't live without my bae
[02:17.97]And she wanna leave but I think it's easier
[02:21.72]If you let me be you should come and see me girl
[02:25.60]Just think about it girl you should know I still think about you yeah
[02:29.34]I know you're into diamonds I can tell you everything defined in you
[02:33.55]But I'm like
[02:34.58]Wait can you turn around can you turn around
[02:37.90]Just wait can we work this out can we work this out
[02:41.64]Just wait can you come here please 'cause I wanna be with you

[02:56.92]Just wait could you come here please 'cause I wanna be with you
data.trans:
[ti:Wait]
[ar:Maroon 5/A Boogie Wit Da Hoodie]
[al:Wait]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:02.79]//
[00:05.58]//
[00:08.37]你妈妈眼里的火辣造型
[00:09.71]
[00:12.13]而我从未见你穿过这颜色的裙装
[00:15.28]
[00:15.80]这是个特殊场合
[00:17.59]
[00:19.56]我未在受邀之列但我很开心我还是来了
[00:23.07]就允许我道歉吧
[00:25.83]
[00:26.63]我会挽回 挽回你我 补偿 补偿你
[00:29.64]
[00:30.74]你的爱 我怎愿就这样失去
[00:33.39]
[00:34.33]我求求你 求求你 求求你
[00:37.22]
[00:38.35]耐心等待 你能否为我转身 能否重回我身边
[00:41.75]默默等待 我们能否挽回这段感情重新开始
[00:45.53]我只是默默等待 你能否重回我身边 因为我只想在你身边
[00:51.77]
[00:53.60]耐心等待 你能否为我转身 能否重回我身边

[01:00.78]我只是默默等待 你能否重回我身边 因为我只想在你身边
[01:05.34]
[01:09.31]我们能单独聊聊么
[01:10.79]
[01:13.17]这种徘徊犹豫的感觉 我真的已经厌倦
[01:16.16]
[01:16.85]难道不是想将自己灌醉 不愿想起么
[01:18.34]
[01:20.61]我需要再来些酒 给我勇气来对你说
[01:24.08]就允许我道歉吧
[01:27.49]我会挽回 挽回你我 补偿 补偿你
[01:31.81]你的爱 我怎愿就这样失去

[02:17.97]她想要离开 但我觉得这样更简单
